storyInfo: Friston-3 brings the buggies back under control. The elite operators move to rendezvous with the Doctor. Mission objective: Support Kal'tsit and penetrate the Abyss.

attributes.content: Playlist 'Golden Oldies' selected...
Resuming from previous playback—
—My love♪
Blows the blossoms on the hills—♪
Now's not the time for karaoke, Friston-3!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You think I wanted to do that?!
attributes.name: Friston-3
Friston-3
attributes.content: My playback module is customized, and I don't have the remote—

attributes.name: Friston-3
attributes.content: Damn you, Closure!
attributes.joined: My playback module is customized, and I don't have the remote—Damn you, Closure!

attributes.content: Blaze! Watch out for Justice Knight!
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Which damnable subdirectory did Closure put my code synchronization function in?!
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: —Gonna give you my tears♪
Save my precious—♪
Kitten, on my six. Justice Knight has me in her sights—
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Got it. Whoa, almost hit Justice Knight—
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Ouch! Stop running into me!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: (Rams with burning heat)
attributes.name: Abnormal THRM-EX

attributes.content: Burn, burning—Boom... mmmmmmmmm—
attributes.name: Abnormal THRM-EX

attributes.content: —No matter who♪
Whispers of love, one trap one lifetime♪
Alright, THRM-EX! Let's see who burns brighter!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hey, don't hurt the buggies—
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I know! I got this.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Protect, protect, friends—
attributes.name: Abnormal Castle-3

attributes.content: You need healing, Friston-3.
attributes.name: Abnormal Lancet-2

attributes.content: I guess I should thank Closure for fitting that energy barrier generator—
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: —Here's my most beloved♪
You shine in my tears—♪
Friston-3! How long do you need?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The synchronization module is ready, but I can't jump across this Originium.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: I'll make a path for you. Now!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Friston-3 accelerates up the ramp and takes flight.
As he spins in mid-air, he can not help but throw a photo out.
(Man, it's been so long... so long since I moved like this.)
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: (That synchronized transmission system that you boasted about had better work, Closure...)
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Guide these crazy carts into position and immobilize them. I'll fix them!
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: —A gift to you♪
This love in my heart—♪
I have a connection!
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: The song continues to echo in the empty desert.
—A gift to you♪
This love in my heart—♪
There is no question that the playback module has malfunctioned, playing Closure's favorite ballads over and over, as though this scene were supposed to be some tear-jerker.
But what he is actually doing is sharing the dream of inevitable parting with a few buggies that do not even have minds of their own, sharing his deepest memories as a human.
Trevor Friston would have no shortage of profanities to spew, if he could spew them.
What's this place...? I thought we were trapped in a... in a... uh...
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: I don't remember anything—
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Beep beep! Anomalous target detected!
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Who are you?!
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Use your brains, whatever they're made of!
attributes.name: Trevor Friston

attributes.content: Closure says you're supposed to be smart!
attributes.name: Trevor Friston

attributes.content: That voice, that tone... y-you're Friston-3!
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: But Friston-3 isn't as tall as you are.
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: No, he is Friston-3! I feel a familiar warmth from him—
attributes.name: THRM-EX

attributes.content: Warmth... how come I can't feel my own warmth anymore—
attributes.name: THRM-EX

attributes.content: Ugh, this is such a headache.
attributes.name: Trevor Friston

attributes.content: Maybe this will make you feel better.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: What is this place?
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: My dream. A dream that was a surprise to me too.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Now shut up and listen.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Something is wrong with PRTS. I have a pretty good idea of what's going on. Someone made your cognitive modules go haywire, and you were wreaking havoc all over the place. I had no choice but to put a stop to it.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Beep beep. Justice Knight does not understand.
attributes.name: 'Justice Knight'

attributes.content: Basically, I'm rewriting your bottom-layer code with my core code. I'll ensure that your memory modules remain intact, of course.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: This will take some time. In order to make sure that you stay put during this time, I had to connect your cognitive modules to mine.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: The side effect is... *expletive from an unknown language* I share my dreams involuntarily.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: What is going on, Friston-3?
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: A friend of mine is waking up from a long slumber.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Stop thinking. It'll overload your brains.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: What you need to do is walk with me before things come to a close. The gathering is about to begin...
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: A blonde dances joyfully in the camp filled with lights and ribbons.
It is a party!
attributes.name: THRM-EX

attributes.content: No... a wedding. My daughter's wedding.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Are we not going to join, Friston-3?
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: We'll watch from here. I don't want to go there, because it means I'll once again—
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Are you sad?
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: ...You can tell?
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Of course! Are we not the same?
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: You said someone made our cognitive modules go haywire. Why did you help us?
attributes.name: Castle-3

attributes.content: No particularly special reason. Like Lancet-2 said, we're the same... at least we are now, on Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Life on this ship is peaceful. I won't say I like it, but compared to that dream without an end, those unrealized futures, it's not as...
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: It's not as bad.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Trevor Friston can hear the familiar laughter of his daughter.
A wedding that he must miss, a promise that he must break. Perhaps, if he did not go any closer, he would not have to watch her walk away...
...Code overwrite complete. Let's go home.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: He does not wish to stay there, not even for a moment longer.
What happened to Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Friston-3? Are they all back to normal?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: For now.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: I rewrote the sections of their code associated with PRTS, ensuring their basic operation with my own core code.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Great. Now we can go and help Misery's team, kitten.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Where are you going next, Friston-3?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I'll have a meeting with the kids, now that they've woken up. There should be something that we can help with.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: I'll talk to Closure. I've got a score to settle with her anyway.
attributes.name: Friston-3

attributes.content: Looks like the buggies are back to normal for now, Amiya.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: What about Mr. Friston?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Well, he seems a little pissed at me... other than that, everything looks alright.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Great idea, rewriting PRTS-associated code with his own. Would have been a lot of trouble otherwise.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Are all our PRTS permissions gone?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm afraid so.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: PRTS is actively blocking all of our access. All of its operations take place in a black box now.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Kal'tsit is fighting to take control, but I'm not sure how long she can keep it up.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: Cut off the core power supply of PRTS.;Manually activate the backup system and fight for control over the ship.

attributes.content: Cutting off the core power supply means going into the Abyss directly. It's risky.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I'll protect the Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Besides, we're not alone. The elite operators stand with us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm not abandoning the Doctor or Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: My ZOOT system is unable to fully wrestle control from PRTS.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Kal'tsit and I have done simulations about this sort of situation.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: By force-booting it with the ship's power, it may be able to temporarily establish control over certain non-core areas...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: But all outcomes end with destruction of its core components due to overload.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You've already made a decision, haven't you?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hah, I can get to work right now.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: If I can make one, I can make another.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: We will activate the backup command system at the same time as we attempt to penetrate the Abyss.

attributes.content: Now, you're finally coming online.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I've waited for this moment for too long. Let me take a good look at you—
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Closure awaits with anxious anticipation. She had longed for the day when it would truly come online, just as much as she had feared it.
For it would mean that Rhodes Island was once again in desperate straits—

attributes.text: \n\nZOOT command system online. Updating permission log...
\n\nWarning: Awakening failed. Unable to bypass PRTS restrictions.

attributes.content: ...Activate overload.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.text: Backup power detected. Source—Rhodes Island mobility layer. 71% remaining.
\n\nWarning: Overload mode will greatly reduce equipment lifespan.
Warning: ZOOT core program is being overwritten—
Warning: Insufficient power to continue operating the ZOOT system—

attributes.content: Wait! Hang in there, 'Zeroth Order Oil Tank'!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Dammit. It's all or nothing!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.text: Warning: Insufficient backup power. Time remaining: Twenty-one minutes.

attributes.content: We're being attacked by PRTS, Doctor. ZOOT will coordinate defenses with Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The rest is up to you!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: In position.
attributes.name: Raidian

attributes.content: Acknowleged.
attributes.name: Mantra

attributes.content: Waiting for you on the front lines.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Moving to rendezvous point.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Be right there.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: I'm here, Doctor.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: It's been a long time since we've had a good brawl together!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The Bad Guy has returned. Moving to rendezvous.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Give me a minute.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: I'm here.
attributes.name: Pith

attributes.content: Assembling.
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: Waiting for you.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.options: Core objective—enter Abyss and cut off PRTS's core power supply.
